@Test public void testDigammaSmallArgs(){
  double[] expected={-10.423754940411076795,-100.56088545786867450,-1000.5755719318103005,-10000.577051183514335,-100000.57719921568107,-1.0000005772140199687e6,-1.0000000577215500408e7,-1.0000000057721564845e8,-1.0000000005772156633e9,-1.0000000000577215665e10,-1.0000000000057721566e11,-1.0000000000005772157e12,-1.0000000000000577216e13,-1.0000000000000057722e14,-1.0000000000000005772e15,-1e+16,-1e+17,-1e+18,-1e+19,-1e+20,-1e+21,-1e+22,-1e+23,-1e+24,-1e+25,-1e+26,-1e+27,-1e+28,-1e+29,-1e+30};
  for (double n=1; n < 30; n++) {
    checkRelativeError(String.format("Test %.0f: ",n),expected[(int)(n - 1)],Gamma.digamma(FastMath.pow(10.0,-n)),1e-8);
  }
}
